name: ghost
description: Ghost is a powerful, open-source blogging platform and CMS focused on publishing, newsletters, and memberships. It offers a clean writing interface, custom themes, APIs, and managed hosting as an option alongside self-hosting.

features.title: Theme Customization
features.description: Design unique sites with a flexible theming system and extensive customization options

features.title: REST API
features.description: Access content programmatically via RESTful and GraphQL APIs for headless implementations

features.title: Tagging System
features.description: Built-in SEO features including meta tags, sitemaps, and structured data

features.title: Markdown Support
features.description: Write with a clean, distraction-free editor supporting markdown and rich media

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Choose between self-hosting or Ghost's managed cloud hosting service
